org.deidentifier.arx.algorithm

Class FLASHAlgorithmIterative

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.deidentifier.arx.algorithm.AbstractFLASHAlgorithm
        • org.deidentifier.arx.algorithm.FLASHAlgorithmIterative

  • public class FLASHAlgorithmIterative
extends AbstractFLASHAlgorithm
    This class provides a reference implementation of the Iterative FLASH Algorithm.
